GSD.description:
dm crypt: make printing of the key constant-time

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.2 by commit eb27bd452e9f656cb7b1a6c091c2a84d520d6258. For more details please see the references link.
